fields.title: Unusual farewell
fields.quote: I don’t know half of you half as well as I should like; and I like less than half of you half as well as you deserve.
fields.author: Bilbo Baggins

fields.title: On education
fields.quote: The child is capable of developing and giving us tangible proof of the possibility of a better humanity. He has shown us the true process of construction of the human being. We have seen children totally change as they acquire a love for things and as their sense of order, discipline, and self-control develops within them.... The child is both a hope and a promise for mankind.
fields.author: Maria Montessori
